text.name: sys_description
text.text: Gaelco is a video game development and publishing company specializing in the arcade industry. In 2007, Gaelco left arcade games aside and started producing and marketing darts under the name 'Gaelco Darts', then focused on 'Radikal DARTS', launched earlier in 2003. C Thus the section developing video games, Gaelco Multimedia is closed and the company focuses on its new activity.
